name: Carhartt Men's Force Cotton Short Sleeve T-shirt
shortDescription: The Carhartt Men's Force™ Cotton Short Sleeve T-shirt features sweat-wicking technology and raglan-style sleeves.

name: Brazos Men's Blacksmith Hooded Flannel Shirt Jacket
shortDescription: The Brazos™ Men's Blacksmith Hooded Flannel Shirt Jacket is made of cotton and features a quilted nylon lining.

name: Guy Harvey Men's Black Magic Short Sleeve T-shirt
shortDescription: The Guy Harvey Men's Black Magic Short Sleeve T-shirt features cotton construction and a patriotic, screen-printed graphic on the back.

name: BCG Men's Short Sleeve Turbo T-shirt
shortDescription: The BCG™ Men's Short Sleeve Turbo T-shirt is made of 94% polyester and 6% spandex and features moisture-wicking fabric technology.
